parameter.name: inset_bottom
parameter.help: The bottom inset for content appearing within a tabelement. Default is 8.

parameter.name: inset_left
parameter.help: The left inset for content appearing within a tabelement. Default is 8.

parameter.name: inset_right
parameter.help: The right inset for content appearing within a tabelement. Default is 8.

parameter.name: inset_top
parameter.help: The top inset for content appearing within a tabelement. Default is 8.

parameter.name: mintabheight
parameter.help: The default height of every tab when closed. Default is 22.

parameter.name: slideduration
parameter.help: The duration of the tabs openning and closing. Default is 300.

parameter.name: spacing
parameter.help: The spacing of the tabs. Default is 0.
